description: Defines interfaces for repositories related to content, metadata, assets, and ratings, along with mock implementations for offline mode. Also includes data classes for copy and images used within the app.

classes.name: IndiceCopy
classes.description: Data class holding textual content copy like titles, sections, call-to-actions, and helper text.

classes.name: InstructionImages
classes.description: Data class that holds asset paths for instruction images used in the app.

classes.name: MockContentRepository
classes.description: A mock implementation of ContentRepository for offline or testing purposes, providing static content.

classes.name: MockMetadataRepository
classes.description: A mock implementation of MetadataRepository that retrieves copy from Android resources.

classes.name: MockAssetsRepository
classes.description: A mock implementation of AssetsRepository returning static asset paths.

classes.name: MockRatingRepository
classes.description: A mock implementation of RatingRepository managing like states in-memory.

methods.name: getHomeSections
methods.description: Retrieves a list of home section names, simulated with a small delay.

methods.name: getIndiceCopy
methods.description: Retrieves copy data from Android resources, including titles and headers.

methods.name: getInstructionImages
methods.description: Returns a set of predefined asset paths for instruction images.

methods.name: isLiked
methods.description: Checks if a particular content ID is liked.

methods.name: setLike
methods.description: Sets the liked status for a specific content ID.
